flowchart TD
    subgraph "INQUIRY STAGE"
        A1[Initial Contact] --> A2{Contact Method?}
        A2 -->|Phone| A3[Phone Script Initiated]
        A2 -->|Email| A4[Email Template Response]
        A2 -->|Web Form| A5[Auto-Response + CRM Entry]
        
        A3 --> A6[Capture Basic Details]
        A4 --> A6
        A5 --> A6
        
        A6 --> A7{Eligible?}
        A7 -->|Yes| A8[Schedule Needs Analysis Call]
        A7 -->|No| A9[Explain Requirements + Exit]
        A7 -->|Unclear| A10[Request Additional Information]
        
        A10 --> A6
    end
    
    subgraph "NEEDS ANALYSIS STAGE"
        A8 --> B1[Conduct Needs Analysis Call]
        B1 --> B2[Document Vehicle Requirements]
        B2 --> B3[Explain Salary Sacrifice Process]
        B3 --> B4[Confirm Budget Parameters]
        B4 --> B5{Interest Level?}
        
        B5 -->|High| B6[Proceed to Quoting]
        B5 -->|Medium| B7[Schedule Follow-up Call in 48hrs]
        B5 -->|Low| B8[Send Information Pack]
        
        B7 -->|Follow-up Completed| B9{Interest Changed?}
        B9 -->|Increased| B6
        B9 -->|Same| B7
        B9 -->|Decreased| B8
        
        B8 -->|After 5 Days| B10[Final Follow-up Call]
        B10 --> B11{Response?}
        B11 -->|Positive| B6
        B11 -->|Negative| B12[Move to Inactive Pipeline]
    end
    
    subgraph "QUOTING STAGE"
        B6 --> C1[Research Vehicle Options]
        C1 --> C2[Calculate Tax Implications]
        C2 --> C3[Prepare Indicative VSSS]
        C3 --> C4[Send Indicative VSSS]
        C4 -->|Set 12hr Timer| C5[Follow-up Call]
        
        C5 --> C6{Customer Response?}
        C6 -->|Accepts| C10[Prepare Final VSSS]
        C6 -->|Requests Changes| C7[Document Required Changes]
        C6 -->|Needs Time| C8[Schedule Decision Call]
        C6 -->|Declines| C9[Document Reasons + Exit]
        
        C7 --> C3
        C8 -->|Decision Made| C6
        
        C10 --> C11[Send Final VSSS via DocuSign]
        C11 --> C12{Signed Within 48hrs?}
        C12 -->|Yes| D1
        C12 -->|No| C13[Follow-up Call]
        
        C13 --> C14{Still Interested?}
        C14 -->|Yes| C15[Extend Deadline 48hrs]
        C14 -->|No| C16[Document Reasons + Exit]
        
        C15 --> C12
    end
    
    subgraph "APPROVAL STAGE"
        D1[Receive Signed VSSS] --> D2[Submit for Employer Approval]
        D2 --> D3{Approval Status?}
        D3 -->|Approved| D7[Notify Customer of Approval]
        D3 -->|Pending| D4[Daily Status Check]
        D3 -->|Rejected| D5[Document Reasons]
        
        D4 -->|After 3 Days| D6[Escalate to Manager]
        D6 --> D3
        
        D5 --> D8[Discuss Alternatives with Customer]
        D8 --> D9{Alternative Path?}
        D9 -->|Modify Application| C7
        D9 -->|Cancel| D10[Document Cancellation + Exit]
    end
    
    subgraph "VEHICLE ORDERING STAGE"
        D7 --> E1[Contact Dealership]
        E1 --> E2[Confirm Vehicle Availability]
        E2 --> E3{Available?}
        E3 -->|Yes| E7[Place Order with Dealership]
        E3 -->|No| E4[Discuss Alternatives]
        
        E4 --> E5{Decision?}
        E5 -->|Select Alternative| E6[Update VSSS]
        E5 -->|Wait| E8[Set Backorder Status]
        E5 -->|Cancel| E9[Process Cancellation + Exit]
        
        E6 --> C10
        E8 -->|Check Weekly| E3
        
        E7 --> E10[Process Purchase Order]
        E10 --> E11[Send Order Confirmation to Customer]
        E11 --> E12[Schedule Weekly Updates]
    end
    
    subgraph "VEHICLE DELIVERY STAGE"
        E12 --> F1[Monitor Build/Delivery Progress]
        F1 -->|30 Days Before Delivery| F2[Confirm Delivery Details]
        F2 --> F3[Arrange Insurance]
        F3 --> F4[Schedule Handover]
        
        F4 --> F5{Delivery On Schedule?}
        F5 -->|Yes| F8[Pre-delivery Inspection]
        F5 -->|No| F6[Notify Customer of Delay]
        
        F6 --> F7[Reschedule Delivery]
        F7 --> F5
        
        F8 --> F9[Process Final Documentation]
        F9 --> F10[Conduct Handover Meeting]
        F10 --> F11[Complete Delivery Checklist]
        F11 --> G1[Set Follow-up Task]
    end
    
    subgraph "AFTER-SALES STAGE"
        G1 --> G2[7-Day Satisfaction Call]
        G2 --> G3[Document Feedback]
        G3 --> G4{Issues Identified?}
        G4 -->|Yes| G5[Create Resolution Plan]
        G4 -->|No| G6[Schedule 3-Month Follow-up]
        
        G5 --> G7[Resolve Issues]
        G7 --> G6
        
        G6 --> G8[Quarterly Check-in Calls]
        G8 -->|10 Months| G9[Begin Renewal Process]
    end
    
    A9 -.-> H1[EXIT: Not Eligible]
    C9 -.-> H2[EXIT: Quote Declined]
    C16 -.-> H3[EXIT: VSSS Not Signed]
    D10 -.-> H4[EXIT: Approval Rejected]
    E9 -.-> H5[EXIT: Order Cancelled]

Thank you for calling SG Fleet, this is Harrington.

(response)

Hi. NAME...

Before we continue, just a reminder that this call is recorded for
quality and training.

I understand you are interested in a Novated Lease?

-   Is this the first time you've considered a Novated Lease, or have
    you done one before?

**First timer?...**

*I'll be more than happy to explain the ins and outs of a novated lease
and walk you through exactly how it all works. But just before we get
into that, I want to ask you some questions that will allow me to make
sure the lease best reflects what you need.*

1.  What do you drive now?

    a.  Do you have a plan of what you'll do with that? Is this going to
        replace it, or do you think you'll keep that as a second
        vehicle?

    b.  How did you pay for that one? *Did you finance it or pay cash?*

2.  In terms of the new car... Do you have a particular car in mind?

```{=html}
<!-- -->
```
i.  Make and Model

ii. Specs or must haves

```{=html}
<!-- -->
```
3.  Have you test driven the car?

```{=html}
<!-- -->
```
a.  If YES, where did you test drive it?

b.  Have you left a deposit and placed an order?

c.  Did they have the car in stock?

```{=html}
<!-- -->
```
4.  Is there a specific timeline in which you need the car by?

I will now explain how a Novated Lease work and the benefits that will
apply to you.

I will then get some more details and information from you to put
together an indicative quote.

***[Educating the Customer]{.underline}***

A novated lease is a combination of a pre- and post-tax deduction that
is tied to your payroll.

These deductions incorporate **[all]{.underline}** the vehicles running
costs and expenses that you would typically pay for over the ownership
of that car. This means the deductions include not just the repayments
for the vehicle itself but also:

-   Fuel

-   Rego

-   Insurance

-   Vehicle maintenance and servicing

-   Even tires

Another significant benefit of a novated lease is that the vehicle is
financed **[less the GST]{.underline}**, ALL the running costs are [GST
free]{.underline}, AND you get to pay for a portion of the transaction
using your pre-tax dollars.

We will set out a budget for these costs, that is tailored to you and
your personal style of driving and pay cycle. This means you are only
paying for what you use depending on how much you'll drive.

Getting your budget correct is an important aspect of a Novated Lease.

-   If we underestimate your running costs the lease will look cheap and
    attractive, however you won't have money to cover all the running
    costs.

-   If we over-budget, it will look too expensive, and you won't want to
    take the lease.

The vehicle is also [fully maintained]{.underline}, meaning you'll get
fuel cards for your fuel, the dealer will invoice us for your servicing,
same with the tyre shop. Rego renewals can be uploaded, and we'll pay
them directly.

So, other than tolls and fines, you should not need to outlay any
further money on your vehicle outside of those deductions.

The easy way to think of this, is that the deductions will go to an
account held at SG Fleet. As you spend money on the vehicle, it will
deduct from that account, and you can manage and monitor this through
our online app.

Throughout the lease you're paying the vehicle down to a residual or
balloon amount which is a fixed amount and is set by the ATO.

At the end of the lease, you will have a few options.

1.  If you love the car, you can pay out the balloon and the car is
    yours to keep.

2.  If you love the car [and the lease]{.underline}, you can refinance
    and extend the lease and keep paying it down over time.

3.  Or, the most popular option, is to trade the car in and upgrade into
    a new vehicle to restart all the tax benefits while enjoying the
    latest and greatest and getting that new car feeling again. Any
    equity you have in the vehicle is yours to keep.

With regards to sourcing the vehicle for you!

Another significant benefit to using SG Fleet is that we are often
entitled to fleet discounts which may not otherwise have access to as
well as having access to a vast network of dealers and we can often
source cars that are proving harder to secure.

[*Even if you have found a specific vehicle at a specific dealership, I
still suggest letting my procurement specialist tender out a quote
request to our network, just to see if we can get an even better deal
for you. Worst case scenario is that you proceed with the car you have
in mind right now. Best case scenario, we can source a better match in
terms of the specs you are after, we can source one sooner, or
potentially even secure a better price. You are not obliged to proceed
with any quotes we receive back*.]{.mark}

All our new quotes will include an Eco Protection Pack and Minor Damage
Repair membership.

**\*\*don't pause here in the call, move onto asking a question
fast\*\***

**And in addition to the quote itself. I will also include the link to
our** [Trade Advantage]{.underline} program. This is a really simple
process, and we will use our extensive network of wholesalers to get you
an obligation free valuation done on your existing car. (If said not
trading -- Just in case you do decide to trade-in once you see the value
we get back)

If you're happy with the price and you do want to trade it in. We make
it as easy as possible and will even come and collect the car for you to
save you the time and effort and we will transfer the funds directly
into your bank account.

Do you have any questions at this point?

So that I can generate a quote for you, can I ask you some questions:

1.  Who do you work for?

2.  What is your gross annual income?

3.  For insurance purposes, can I confirm:

```{=html}
<!-- -->
```
a.  your postcode and suburb?

b.  In the last 3 years have you had 2 or more at fault claims?

c.  In the last 3 years have you been charged with a DUI

d.  Or in the last 3 years have you been charged with negligent driving?

**To summarise, the vehicle you are looking at:**

**Vehicle Brand:**

**Model:**

**Variant:**

**Series:**

**Auto/Manual:**

**Preference on colour:**

**Any additional accessories (e.g. Floor Mats, Tow Bar):**

Now in terms of the lease itself and how we will structure it:

i.  How many years would you like the lease to be?

ii. How many kilometres a year are you currently travelling?

iii. Another thing to be aware of is that this quote will include
     LeaseGuard, this is an involuntary redundancy protection. It is an
     optional inclusion and will cover you in the event of involuntary
     redundancy. It covers payments under your lease for up to 11
     months; or \$15,000.

Thank you very much, I will send you an indicative quote to give you an
idea of how the lease will look. Along with the quote you will also
receive a link to complete the finance pre-approval and the email
regarding our trade in program.

Most customer choose to get their finance pre-approved while we find a
car for you as the approval lasts for 6 months.

> **[Closing the Call]{.underline}**

Do you have any questions? Or would you like me to go over any point
again?

Okay great, just making sure, I have covered everything in enough detail
for you?

Once I receive the pricing from our dealer network (expected 24 hours),
I will call you and we can move on to the next step. As for now, to make
this as efficient as possible, please just begin filling out the finance
application so I can get this processed while we iron out the finer
details as this is the step that often takes the longest. The
pre-approval lasts for up to 6 months so no harm in getting this
submitted early in the set to prevent any hold ups down the track.

If you have any questions that springs to mind, please don't hesitate to
call/email me. My contact details, including my direct line will be
attached at the bottom of my emails.

Thank you for your time today "name". I will call you again tomorrow to
check-in and see if you have any questions or queries and to let you
know where things are up to on my end... Any questions, please do not
hesitate to reach out. I am here to help.

name: SG Fleet
description:
Document management, daily activities, training, sales focused phone scripts, maintaining extremely compliant with SG Fleet's compliance policies and workplace regulations. 
I am a new employee with SG fleet, having spent 8 years in the sales team with BMW. My job has changed significantly in many ways and I need guidence, training, and mentoring in ways to best adapt to the new role. As well as improve my efficiency, maximising my opportunity to sell more lease contracts. Another highlight is that the role is has great opportunity to really earn some significant amounts of commission if i am able to ensure that i focus on the more beneficial areas of the commission structure, for example, selling lots of accessories and extras, and/or, encouraging them to trade their vehicle with us, and/or, encouraging them to allow SG Fleet to source the vehicle (procurement). These are not all the but some of the ways that I can maximise my earnings.

docs.content:
Daily Structure

8am-9am

-   Clear inbox of all emails that have come in overnight.

9am-11am

-   Call new enquiries that have come in overnight.

-   Follows up half of your pipeline by phone and writes notes of where
    they are up to in the buying process.

-   If a customer doesn't answer, follow them up by email.

-   Calls the customers that have received a quote the afternoon before
    to see if they have any questions then asks for commitment. After
    every call he asks for a form of commitment from the customer
    whether it is completing the finance app or signing the VSSS.

11am-3pm

-   Process customer requests.

-   Processes any finance apps to customers from the 9am-11am call
    session.

-   Process any deals that have come in.

-   Completes all admin and updates any internal documents required.
    This consists of VDC requests.

3pm-4pm

-   Call any new enquiries.

-   Follows up all quotes sent out in the morning by phone and asks the
    customer if they have any questions. After every call asks for a
    form of commitment from the customer whether it is completing the
    finance app or signing the VSSS.

4pm-5pm

-   Completes any last minute emails.

Processes any finance apps to customers from the 3pm-4pm call session

# Comprehensive Insurance -- Vero Premium Fleet Policy

Key Benefits:

-   Designed specifically for a novated lease

-   Full lease payout - no gap

-   Open driver policy -- no requirement to list other drivers

-   1 free windscreen replacement a year all glass covered

-   Emergency Repairs up to \$2,500

-   Personal effects up to \$3000

-   Hire Vehicle up to \$3,000

-   Convenience with automatic renewal

Script:

Insurance is great to have on anything you own, the reason our insurance
is worth adding into your budget is because of our gap cover and to put
that into perspective for you imagine losing your car, claiming your
insurance for the cars market value and then still having a finance
lease that is worth more than your car, so right now you have no car and
you owe money to your lease but with our comprehensive insurance we will
pay out the market value of the car as well as the gap in between the
car and the lease. Plus, additional extras include rental cars, personal
property insurance, towing and accommodation and trailer insurance.

# Lease guard

LeaseGuard covers you in the event of involuntary redundancy.

Includes:

-   Payments under your lease for up to 11 months; or

-   Ability to handback if involuntarily unemployed (after 3 monthly
    lease payments:

# Carbon Offset

Carbon Offset provides financial support for initiatives that directly
off-set the carbon emissions of your vehicle for the life of lease.

The initiatives include:

-   wind farms;

-   forestry projects; and

-   hydroelectric dams.

# Minor Damage Repair

Covers unforeseen minor cosmetic scratches, dents and scuffs caused by
everyday travels.

Includes:

-   Metal Body Panels (surface marks and scratches)

-   Bumper repairs (pressure dents and stone chips)

-   Rims

Script:

The great thing about the Minor Damage Repair membership is say in an
instance where someone hits your car with a shopping trolley at the
shops or a bunch of teenagers take a key to the side of your car you
have the convenience of a mobile expert to come out and fix the issues
making your car stay in showroom condition. Plus you don't need to worry
about putting in a claim through your comprehensive insurance.

# Tint

Darkest legal window tint, blocks up to 99% of UV, and lifetime
warranty.

In addition:

-   Reduction of up to 60% of heat and glare; and

-   Increased privacy.

Script:

Now imagine those same teenagers have the genius idea to have a look at
what personal belongings you have in your car the tint we have expertly
fitted to the car is developed to be the darkest legal tint for all your
privacy needs, it is also going to keep you cooler and protected in the
summer, it comes with UV protection so the seatbelt doesn't leave you
with third degree burns. The film covers front and rear windows and come
with a lifetime warranty.

# Exterior: (Hydro Paint Surface Coating)

Adds a nano coating to the paint which strengthens and gives a permanent
super gloss finish:

Protects against:

-   Bird and bat droppings;

-   Tree sap;

-   Bug splatter; and

-   Sunscreen.

Script:

When you see a car that's been parked on the side of the road for 11
months with faded paint, dirt everywhere and those dried watermarks you
know for a fact that's exactly what you don't want. With the package it
protects against all the negative aesthetics on the exterior of your car
and with a once off lifetime application it will keep your car in show
room condition for the time it's yours.

# Interior: (Activ Interior Coating)

A once-off application designed to preserve and protect the interior of
your new vehicle.

Protects against:

-   Stains caused by food and liquids;

-   Discolouration; and

-   Preserves new car aroma.

My cousin has the interior package and the reason being is because she
has four kids and only two eyes, in her old car she gave up to the fact
of having stains from ice cream and drinks all over the car but now with
her new one she's not worried about the little ones or herself spilling
anything because the interior protection will repel against most liquids
and keep the trim in new condition because in 3-5 years you're not going
to remember the x amount you paid for the protection but you will notice
the stains you see every time you hop in your car.

# Dash Cam

It's the Blackvue DR750s. HD quality filming which accurately records
vehicle licence plates as well as the entire drive.

-   Audible forward collision warning;

-   Motion detection when parked; and

-   Footage can be played through the app.

Script:

Our front and rear dash cams are good ways to make sure all the right
information is recorded and shown, say for instance you get hit or you
see an accident ahead of you the dash cams can record all the footage of
what occurred which then can be played back on our app and then you can
post it online go viral and become instantly rich.

# Roadside Assistance

Our roadside is a premium service, we contract the assistance out to the
fastest provider.

Includes:

-   Australia wide assistance, 24/7;

-   Unlimited Call outs; and

-   Emergency Accommodation and car rental.

Script:

sgfleet's roadside assistance is slightly different to that of a normal
provider in that we contract the assistance out to the fastest provider
at the time of your call. Instead of just using one provider and relying
on their response time we can reach out to multiple providers and have
the fastest response time. Many Roadside assistance policies may not
cover you in the event that you have a breakdown in some regional areas.
sgfleet roadside assistance provides Australia wide coverage.

Document Classification: Confidential

Hi team,

 

Another important reminder:


The delivery of the PHEV must be on or prior to 31 March  - no exceptions;
To maintain the exemption after 1st April 2025, the customer will need to keep the lease with the employer it was established with;
The exemption will continue for PHEVs that were exempt before 1st April 2025, provided there are no changes to the existing novation agreement or driver of the vehicle.
 

 

Again, any aftermarket fitted to a vehicle that doesn’t make the cut-off, and the customer pulls out of, will be a write-off – don’t be a name on that spreadsheet.

 

Finally, give firm expectations about whether a customer will make the cut-off or not. Even if in stock, it’s probably unlikely any new PHEV leads post first week of March will settle.

 

 

Thank you

 

 

Adam Pottinger

Manager Novated Sales

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 1200 2400">
  <!-- Styles -->
  <style>
    .process-box { fill: #e6f2ff; stroke: #3498db; stroke-width: 2; }
    .decision-box { fill: #fff7e6; stroke: #f39c12; stroke-width: 2; }
    .document-box { fill: #e6ffe6; stroke: #2ecc71; stroke-width: 2; }
    .start-end-box { fill: #ffe6e6; stroke: #e74c3c; stroke-width: 2; }
    .arrow { stroke: #2c3e50; stroke-width: 2; fill: none; marker-end: url(#arrowhead); }
    .phase-label { fill: #7f8c8d; font-size: 14px; }
    .highlight-box { fill: #fef9e7; stroke: #f1c40f; stroke-width: 2; stroke-dasharray: 5,3; }
    text { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; fill: #2c3e50; }
    .title { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 24px; font-weight: bold; fill: #2c3e50; }
    .subtitle { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: bold; fill: #2c3e50; }
    .note { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10px; fill: #7f8c8d; font-style: italic; }
    .goal-box { fill: #e8daef; stroke: #8e44ad; stroke-width: 2; }
    .label-box { fill: #f2f4f4; stroke: #95a5a6; stroke-width: 1; }
  </style>

  <defs>

    </marker>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Title -->
  <text x="600" y="50" text-anchor="middle" class="title">Novated Lease Sales Process</text>
  <text x="600" y="80" text-anchor="middle" class="subtitle">From Initial Inquiry to Vehicle Delivery</text>
  
  <!-- Phase 1: Initial Contact -->
  <text x="150" y="120" class="phase-label">PHASE 1: INITIAL CONTACT</text>
  <rect x="100" y="140" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="start-end-box" />
  <text x="180" y="175" text-anchor="middle">Initial Contact</text>
  <text x="180" y="190" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(Email, Phone, Web)</text>
  
  <path d="M180 200 L180 240" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="100" y="240" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="decision-box" />
  <text x="180" y="275" text-anchor="middle">First Time Customer?</text>
  
  <path d="M260 270 L300 270" class="arrow" />
  <text x="280" y="260" text-anchor="middle" class="note">No</text>
  
  <rect x="300" y="240" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="380" y="275" text-anchor="middle">Confirm Requirements</text>
  
  <path d="M180 300 L180 340" class="arrow" />
  <text x="170" y="320" text-anchor="middle" class="note">Yes</text>
  
  <rect x="100" y="340" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="180" y="375" text-anchor="middle">Explain Novated Leasing</text>
  <text x="180" y="390" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(Using Call Script)</text>
  
  <path d="M180 400 L180 440 L380 440 L380 300" class="arrow" />
  
  <path d="M380 240 L450 240 L450 340 L520 340" class="arrow" />
  
  <!-- Phase 2: Quoting Process -->
  <text x="600" y="120" class="phase-label">PHASE 2: QUOTING PROCESS</text>
  <rect x="520" y="140" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="600" y="170" text-anchor="middle">Gather Essential Info</text>
  <text x="600" y="185" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(Vehicle, Salary, Km, etc.)</text>
  
  <path d="M600 200 L600 240" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="520" y="240" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="600" y="265" text-anchor="middle">Complete Quote in Miles</text>
  <text x="600" y="280" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(See Miles Quoting Guide)</text>
  
  <path d="M600 300 L600 340" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="520" y="340" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="document-box" />
  <text x="600" y="365" text-anchor="middle">Send Quote to Customer</text>
  <text x="600" y="380" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(Via Email)</text>
  
  <path d="M600 400 L600 440" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="520" y="440" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="decision-box" />
  <text x="600" y="465" text-anchor="middle">Customer Proceeds?</text>
  <text x="600" y="480" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(Follow-up Call)</text>
  
  <path d="M680 470 L720 470" class="arrow" />
  <text x="700" y="460" text-anchor="middle" class="note">No</text>
  
  <rect x="720" y="440" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="800" y="465" text-anchor="middle">Schedule Follow-up</text>
  <text x="800" y="480" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(7-10 days)</text>
  
  <path d="M800 440 L800 400 L680 400" class="arrow" />
  
  <path d="M600 500 L600 540" class="arrow" />
  <text x="590" y="520" text-anchor="middle" class="note">Yes</text>
  
  <!-- Phase 3: Application Process -->
  <text x="350" y="520" class="phase-label">PHASE 3: APPLICATION PROCESS</text>
  <rect x="520" y="540" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="600" y="565" text-anchor="middle">Trade Appraisal</text>
  <text x="600" y="580" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(If applicable)</text>
  
  <path d="M600 600 L600 640" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="520" y="640" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="600" y="665" text-anchor="middle">Finance Application</text>
  <text x="600" y="680" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(Online or Manual)</text>
  
  <path d="M600 700 L600 740" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="320" y="640" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="400" y="665" text-anchor="middle">Refinance Process</text>
  <text x="400" y="680" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(If applicable)</text>
  
  <path d="M400 700 L400 765 L520 765" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="520" y="740" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="600" y="765" text-anchor="middle">Finance Pre-Assessment</text>
  <text x="600" y="780" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(CBA/Autonomy)</text>
  
  <path d="M600 800 L600 840" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="520" y="840" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="decision-box" />
  <text x="600" y="865" text-anchor="middle">Approval Status?</text>
  
  <path d="M680 865 L720 865" class="arrow" />
  <text x="700" y="855" text-anchor="middle" class="note">Declined</text>
  
  <rect x="720" y="840" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="800" y="865" text-anchor="middle">Review Alternatives</text>
  
  <path d="M800 840 L800 670 L680 670" class="arrow" />
  
  <path d="M600 900 L600 940" class="arrow" />
  <text x="620" y="920" text-anchor="middle" class="note">Approved</text>
  
  <path d="M520 865 L480 865 L480 940 L520 940" class="arrow" />
  <text x="480" y="880" text-anchor="middle" class="note">Conditional</text>
  
  <rect x="520" y="940" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="600" y="965" text-anchor="middle">Meet Conditions</text>
  <text x="600" y="980" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(ID, Income Proof, etc.)</text>
  
  <path d="M600 1000 L600 1040" class="arrow" />
  
  <!-- Phase 4: Vehicle Procurement -->
  <text x="150" y="1020" class="phase-label">PHASE 4: VEHICLE PROCUREMENT</text>
  <rect x="520" y="1040" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="decision-box" />
  <text x="600" y="1065" text-anchor="middle">Vehicle Source?</text>
  
  <path d="M680 1065 L720 1065" class="arrow" />
  <text x="700" y="1055" text-anchor="middle" class="note">Dealer</text>
  
  <rect x="720" y="1040" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="800" y="1065" text-anchor="middle">Dealer Procurement</text>
  <text x="800" y="1080" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(New/Used)</text>
  
  <path d="M520 1065 L480 1065 L480 1140 L520 1140" class="arrow" />
  <text x="480" y="1100" text-anchor="middle" class="note">Non-Dealer</text>
  
  <rect x="520" y="1140" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="decision-box" />
  <text x="600" y="1165" text-anchor="middle">Sale Type?</text>
  
  <path d="M520 1165 L400 1165 L400 1240" class="arrow" />
  <text x="450" y="1155" text-anchor="middle" class="note">Private Sale</text>
  
  <rect x="320" y="1240" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="400" y="1265" text-anchor="middle">Private Sale Process</text>
  <text x="400" y="1280" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(See Checklist)</text>
  
  <path d="M600 1200 L600 1240" class="arrow" />
  <text x="620" y="1220" text-anchor="middle" class="note">Sale & Leaseback</text>
  
  <rect x="520" y="1240" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="600" y="1265" text-anchor="middle">Sale & Leaseback Process</text>
  <text x="600" y="1280" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(See Checklist)</text>
  
  <path d="M680 1165 L800 1165 L800 1240" class="arrow" />
  <text x="750" y="1155" text-anchor="middle" class="note">Company Sale</text>
  
  <rect x="720" y="1240" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="800" y="1265" text-anchor="middle">Company Sale Process</text>
  <text x="800" y="1280" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(GST/Non-GST)</text>
  
  <path d="M400 1300 L400 1340 L600 1340" class="arrow" />
  <path d="M600 1300 L600 1340" class="arrow" />
  <path d="M800 1300 L800 1340 L600 1340" class="arrow" />
  <path d="M800 1100 L800 1340 L600 1340" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="520" y="1340" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="600" y="1365" text-anchor="middle">Submit Vehicle Order</text>
  
  <path d="M600 1400 L600 1440" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="700" y="1380" width="200" height="80" rx="10" ry="10" class="highlight-box" />
  <text x="800" y="1405" text-anchor="middle">PHEV Special Process</text>
  <text x="800" y="1425" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(Delivery by March 31, 2025 for</text>
  <text x="800" y="1445" text-anchor="middle" class="note">FBT Exemption)</text>
  
  <path d="M700 1420 L680 1420 L680 1365 L680 1365" class="arrow" />
  
  <!-- Phase 5: Documentation & Settlement -->
  <text x="600" y="1420" class="phase-label">PHASE 5: DOCUMENTATION & SETTLEMENT</text>
  <rect x="520" y="1440" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="600" y="1465" text-anchor="middle">Generate Finance Docs</text>
  <text x="600" y="1480" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(For Driver & Vendor)</text>
  
  <path d="M600 1500 L600 1540" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="520" y="1540" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="document-box" />
  <text x="600" y="1565" text-anchor="middle">Execute Documents</text>
  <text x="600" y="1580" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(Via DocuSign or Email)</text>
  
  <path d="M600 1600 L600 1640" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="520" y="1640" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="600" y="1665" text-anchor="middle">Submit for Funding</text>
  <text x="600" y="1680" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(24-48 hours)</text>
  
  <path d="M600 1700 L600 1740" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="520" y="1740" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="600" y="1765" text-anchor="middle">Settlement Process</text>
  <text x="600" y="1780" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(1-2 weeks)</text>
  
  <path d="M600 1800 L600 1840" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="520" y="1840" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="600" y="1865" text-anchor="middle">Vehicle Delivery</text>
  <text x="600" y="1880" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(Handover to Customer)</text>
  
  <path d="M600 1900 L600 1940" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="520" y="1940" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="600" y="1965" text-anchor="middle">Post-Delivery Follow-up</text>
  
  <path d="M600 2000 L600 2040" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="520" y="2040" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="start-end-box" />
  <text x="600" y="2065" text-anchor="middle">Ongoing Account</text>
  <text x="600" y="2080" text-anchor="middle">Management</text>
  
  <!-- Sales Goals & KPIs Box -->
  <rect x="900" y="200" width="240" height="240" rx="10" ry="10" class="goal-box" />
  <text x="1020" y="230" text-anchor="middle" class="subtitle">Sales Goals & KPIs</text>
  <text x="920" y="260" text-anchor="start">• Motor Insurance (75%)</text>
  <text x="920" y="285" text-anchor="start">• LeaseGuard (50%)</text>
  <text x="920" y="310" text-anchor="start">• Minor Damage Repair (70%)</text>
  <text x="920" y="335" text-anchor="start">• Carbon Offset (60%)</text>
  <text x="920" y="360" text-anchor="start">• Roadside Assistance (55%)</text>
  <text x="920" y="385" text-anchor="start">• Procured Orders (70%)</text>
  <text x="920" y="410" text-anchor="start">• Trade Appraisals (30 per month)</text>
  
  <!-- Additional Products Box -->
  <rect x="900" y="500" width="240" height="320" rx="10" ry="10" class="document-box" />
  <text x="1020" y="530" text-anchor="middle" class="subtitle">Add-On Products</text>
  <text x="920" y="560" text-anchor="start">• Motor Insurance</text>
  <text x="920" y="585" text-anchor="start">• LeaseGuard (redundancy)</text>
  <text x="920" y="610" text-anchor="start">• Minor Damage Repair</text>
  <text x="920" y="635" text-anchor="start">• Carbon Offset</text>
  <text x="920" y="660" text-anchor="start">• Roadside Assistance</text>
  <text x="920" y="685" text-anchor="start">• Exterior/Interior Protection</text>
  <text x="920" y="710" text-anchor="start">• Window Tint</text>
  <text x="920" y="735" text-anchor="start">• Dash Cam</text>
  <text x="920" y="760" text-anchor="start">• EV Charging Cable</text>
  <text x="920" y="785" text-anchor="start">• Driver Safety Kit</text>
  
  <!-- Daily Structure Box -->
  <rect x="900" y="880" width="240" height="360" rx="10" ry="10" class="label-box" />
  <text x="1020" y="910" text-anchor="middle" class="subtitle">Daily Structure</text>
  <text x="920" y="940" text-anchor="start" font-weight="bold">8am-9am:</text>
  <text x="930" y="960" text-anchor="start">Clear inbox</text>
  
  <text x="920" y="990" text-anchor="start" font-weight="bold">9am-11am:</text>
  <text x="930" y="1010" text-anchor="start">• Call new enquiries</text>
  <text x="930" y="1030" text-anchor="start">• Follow up pipeline</text>
  <text x="930" y="1050" text-anchor="start">• Ask for commitment</text>
  
  <text x="920" y="1080" text-anchor="start" font-weight="bold">11am-3pm:</text>
  <text x="930" y="1100" text-anchor="start">• Process customer requests</text>
  <text x="930" y="1120" text-anchor="start">• Process finance apps</text>
  <text x="930" y="1140" text-anchor="start">• Complete admin tasks</text>
  
  <text x="920" y="1170" text-anchor="start" font-weight="bold">3pm-4pm:</text>
  <text x="930" y="1190" text-anchor="start">• Call new enquiries</text>
  <text x="930" y="1210" text-anchor="start">• Follow up morning quotes</text>
  
  <text x="920" y="1240" text-anchor="start" font-weight="bold">4pm-5pm:</text>
  <text x="930" y="1260" text-anchor="start">• Complete final emails/tasks</text>

  <!-- Key Document Types Legend -->
  <rect x="900" y="1300" width="240" height="220" rx="10" ry="10" class="document-box" />
  <text x="1020" y="1330" text-anchor="middle" class="subtitle">Key Documents</text>
  <text x="920" y="1360" text-anchor="start">• Finance Application</text>
  <text x="920" y="1385" text-anchor="start">• Novation Agreement</text>
  <text x="920" y="1410" text-anchor="start">• Privacy Consent Form</text>
  <text x="920" y="1435" text-anchor="start">• Direct Debit Request</text>
  <text x="920" y="1460" text-anchor="start">• Certified ID (if required)</text>
  <text x="920" y="1485" text-anchor="start">• Tax Invoice/Statement by</text>
  <text x="930" y="1505" text-anchor="start">Supplier (non-dealer)</text>
</svg>

docs.filename: Comprehensive Novated Lease Sales Process Flowchart (Revised).svg
docs.content:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 1200 2400">
  <!-- Styles -->
  <style>
    .process-box { fill: #e6f2ff; stroke: #3498db; stroke-width: 2; }
    .decision-box { fill: #fff7e6; stroke: #f39c12; stroke-width: 2; }
    .document-box { fill: #e6ffe6; stroke: #2ecc71; stroke-width: 2; }
    .start-end-box { fill: #ffe6e6; stroke: #e74c3c; stroke-width: 2; }
    .arrow { stroke: #2c3e50; stroke-width: 2; fill: none; marker-end: url(#arrowhead); }
    .phase-label { fill: #7f8c8d; font-size: 14px; }
    .highlight-box { fill: #fef9e7; stroke: #f1c40f; stroke-width: 2; stroke-dasharray: 5,3; }
    text { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; fill: #2c3e50; }
    .title { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 24px; font-weight: bold; fill: #2c3e50; }
    .subtitle { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: bold; fill: #2c3e50; }
    .note { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10px; fill: #7f8c8d; font-style: italic; }
    .goal-box { fill: #e8daef; stroke: #8e44ad; stroke-width: 2; }
    .label-box { fill: #f2f4f4; stroke: #95a5a6; stroke-width: 1; }
  </style>
  
  <!-- Arrow Marker -->
  <defs>
    <marker id="arrowhead" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="7" refX="9" refY="3.5" orient="auto">
      <polygon points="0 0, 10 3.5, 0 7" fill="#2c3e50" />
    </marker>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Title -->
  <text x="600" y="50" text-anchor="middle" class="title">Novated Lease Sales Process</text>
  <text x="600" y="80" text-anchor="middle" class="subtitle">From Initial Inquiry to Vehicle Delivery</text>
  
  <!-- Phase 1: Initial Contact -->
  <text x="150" y="120" class="phase-label">PHASE 1: INITIAL CONTACT</text>
  <rect x="100" y="140" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="start-end-box" />
  <text x="180" y="175" text-anchor="middle">Initial Contact</text>
  <text x="180" y="190" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(Email, Phone, Web)</text>
  
  <path d="M180 200 L180 240" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="100" y="240" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="decision-box" />
  <text x="180" y="275" text-anchor="middle">First Time Customer?</text>
  
  <path d="M260 270 L300 270" class="arrow" />
  <text x="280" y="260" text-anchor="middle" class="note">No</text>
  
  <rect x="300" y="240" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="380" y="275" text-anchor="middle">Confirm Requirements</text>
  
  <path d="M180 300 L180 340" class="arrow" />
  <text x="170" y="320" text-anchor="middle" class="note">Yes</text>
  
  <rect x="100" y="340" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="180" y="375" text-anchor="middle">Explain Novated Leasing</text>
  <text x="180" y="390" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(Using Call Script)</text>
  
  <path d="M180 400 L180 440 L380 440 L380 300" class="arrow" />
  
  <path d="M380 240 L450 240 L450 340 L520 340" class="arrow" />
  
  <!-- Phase 2: Quoting Process -->
  <text x="600" y="120" class="phase-label">PHASE 2: QUOTING PROCESS</text>
  <rect x="520" y="140" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="600" y="170" text-anchor="middle">Gather Essential Info</text>
  <text x="600" y="185" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(Vehicle, Salary, Km, etc.)</text>
  
  <path d="M600 200 L600 240" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="520" y="240" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="600" y="265" text-anchor="middle">Complete Quote in Miles</text>
  <text x="600" y="280" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(See Miles Quoting Guide)</text>
  
  <path d="M600 300 L600 340" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="520" y="340" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="document-box" />
  <text x="600" y="365" text-anchor="middle">Send Quote to Customer</text>
  <text x="600" y="380" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(Via Email)</text>
  
  <path d="M600 400 L600 440" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="520" y="440" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="decision-box" />
  <text x="600" y="465" text-anchor="middle">Customer Proceeds?</text>
  <text x="600" y="480" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(Follow-up Call)</text>
  
  <path d="M680 470 L720 470" class="arrow" />
  <text x="700" y="460" text-anchor="middle" class="note">No</text>
  
  <rect x="720" y="440" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="800" y="465" text-anchor="middle">Schedule Follow-up</text>
  <text x="800" y="480" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(7-10 days)</text>
  
  <path d="M800 440 L800 400 L680 400" class="arrow" />
  
  <path d="M600 500 L600 540" class="arrow" />
  <text x="590" y="520" text-anchor="middle" class="note">Yes</text>
  
  <!-- Phase 3: Application Process -->
  <text x="350" y="520" class="phase-label">PHASE 3: APPLICATION PROCESS</text>
  <rect x="520" y="540" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="600" y="565" text-anchor="middle">Trade Appraisal</text>
  <text x="600" y="580" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(If applicable)</text>
  
  <path d="M600 600 L600 640" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="520" y="640" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="600" y="665" text-anchor="middle">Finance Application</text>
  <text x="600" y="680" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(Online or Manual)</text>
  
  <path d="M600 700 L600 740" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="320" y="640" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="400" y="665" text-anchor="middle">Refinance Process</text>
  <text x="400" y="680" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(If applicable)</text>
  
  <path d="M400 700 L400 765 L520 765" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="520" y="740" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="600" y="765" text-anchor="middle">Finance Pre-Assessment</text>
  <text x="600" y="780" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(CBA/Autonomy)</text>
  
  <path d="M600 800 L600 840" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="520" y="840" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="decision-box" />
  <text x="600" y="865" text-anchor="middle">Approval Status?</text>
  
  <path d="M680 865 L720 865" class="arrow" />
  <text x="700" y="855" text-anchor="middle" class="note">Declined</text>
  
  <rect x="720" y="840" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="800" y="865" text-anchor="middle">Review Alternatives</text>
  
  <path d="M800 840 L800 670 L680 670" class="arrow" />
  
  <path d="M600 900 L600 940" class="arrow" />
  <text x="620" y="920" text-anchor="middle" class="note">Approved</text>
  
  <path d="M520 865 L480 865 L480 940 L520 940" class="arrow" />
  <text x="480" y="880" text-anchor="middle" class="note">Conditional</text>
  
  <rect x="520" y="940" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="600" y="965" text-anchor="middle">Meet Conditions</text>
  <text x="600" y="980" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(ID, Income Proof, etc.)</text>
  
  <path d="M600 1000 L600 1040" class="arrow" />
  
  <!-- Phase 4: Vehicle Procurement -->
  <text x="150" y="1020" class="phase-label">PHASE 4: VEHICLE PROCUREMENT</text>
  <rect x="520" y="1040" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="decision-box" />
  <text x="600" y="1065" text-anchor="middle">Vehicle Source?</text>
  
  <path d="M680 1065 L720 1065" class="arrow" />
  <text x="700" y="1055" text-anchor="middle" class="note">Dealer</text>
  
  <rect x="720" y="1040" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="800" y="1065" text-anchor="middle">Dealer Procurement</text>
  <text x="800" y="1080" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(New/Used)</text>
  
  <path d="M520 1065 L480 1065 L480 1140 L520 1140" class="arrow" />
  <text x="480" y="1100" text-anchor="middle" class="note">Non-Dealer</text>
  
  <rect x="520" y="1140" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="decision-box" />
  <text x="600" y="1165" text-anchor="middle">Sale Type?</text>
  
  <path d="M520 1165 L400 1165 L400 1240" class="arrow" />
  <text x="450" y="1155" text-anchor="middle" class="note">Private Sale</text>
  
  <rect x="320" y="1240" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="400" y="1265" text-anchor="middle">Private Sale Process</text>
  <text x="400" y="1280" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(See Checklist)</text>
  
  <path d="M600 1200 L600 1240" class="arrow" />
  <text x="620" y="1220" text-anchor="middle" class="note">Sale & Leaseback</text>
  
  <rect x="520" y="1240" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="600" y="1265" text-anchor="middle">Sale & Leaseback Process</text>
  <text x="600" y="1280" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(See Checklist)</text>
  
  <path d="M680 1165 L800 1165 L800 1240" class="arrow" />
  <text x="750" y="1155" text-anchor="middle" class="note">Company Sale</text>
  
  <rect x="720" y="1240" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="800" y="1265" text-anchor="middle">Company Sale Process</text>
  <text x="800" y="1280" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(GST/Non-GST)</text>
  
  <path d="M400 1300 L400 1340 L600 1340" class="arrow" />
  <path d="M600 1300 L600 1340" class="arrow" />
  <path d="M800 1300 L800 1340 L600 1340" class="arrow" />
  <path d="M800 1100 L800 1340 L600 1340" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="520" y="1340" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="600" y="1365" text-anchor="middle">Submit Vehicle Order</text>
  
  <path d="M600 1400 L600 1440" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="700" y="1380" width="200" height="80" rx="10" ry="10" class="highlight-box" />
  <text x="800" y="1405" text-anchor="middle">PHEV Special Process</text>
  <text x="800" y="1425" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(Delivery by March 31, 2025 for</text>
  <text x="800" y="1445" text-anchor="middle" class="note">FBT Exemption)</text>
  
  <path d="M700 1420 L680 1420 L680 1365" class="arrow" />
  
  <!-- Phase 5: Documentation & Settlement -->
  <text x="600" y="1420" class="phase-label">PHASE 5: DOCUMENTATION & SETTLEMENT</text>
  <rect x="520" y="1440" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="600" y="1465" text-anchor="middle">Generate Finance Docs</text>
  <text x="600" y="1480" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(For Driver & Vendor)</text>
  
  <path d="M600 1500 L600 1540" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="520" y="1540" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="document-box" />
  <text x="600" y="1565" text-anchor="middle">Execute Documents</text>
  <text x="600" y="1580" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(Via DocuSign or Email)</text>
  
  <path d="M600 1600 L600 1640" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="520" y="1640" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="600" y="1665" text-anchor="middle">Submit for Funding</text>
  <text x="600" y="1680" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(24-48 hours)</text>
  
  <path d="M600 1700 L600 1740" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="520" y="1740" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="600" y="1765" text-anchor="middle">Settlement Process</text>
  <text x="600" y="1780" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(1-2 weeks)</text>
  
  <path d="M600 1800 L600 1840" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="520" y="1840" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="600" y="1865" text-anchor="middle">Vehicle Delivery</text>
  <text x="600" y="1880" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(Handover to Customer)</text>
  
  <path d="M600 1900 L600 1940" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="520" y="1940" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="600" y="1965" text-anchor="middle">Post-Delivery Follow-up</text>
  
  <path d="M600 2000 L600 2040" class="arrow" />
  
  <rect x="520" y="2040" width="160" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="start-end-box" />
  <text x="600" y="2065" text-anchor="middle">Ongoing Account</text>
  <text x="600" y="2080" text-anchor="middle">Management</text>
  
  <!-- Sales Goals & KPIs Box -->
  <rect x="900" y="200" width="240" height="240" rx="10" ry="10" class="goal-box" />
  <text x="1020" y="230" text-anchor="middle" class="subtitle">Sales Goals & KPIs</text>
  <text x="920" y="260" text-anchor="start">• Motor Insurance (75%)</text>
  <text x="920" y="285" text-anchor="start">• LeaseGuard (50%)</text>
  <text x="920" y="310" text-anchor="start">• Minor Damage Repair (70%)</text>
  <text x="920" y="335" text-anchor="start">• Carbon Offset (60%)</text>
  <text x="920" y="360" text-anchor="start">• Roadside Assistance (55%)</text>
  <text x="920" y="385" text-anchor="start">• Procured Orders (70%)</text>
  <text x="920" y="410" text-anchor="start">• Trade Appraisals (30 per month)</text>
  
  <!-- Additional Products Box -->
  <rect x="900" y="500" width="240" height="320" rx="10" ry="10" class="document-box" />
  <text x="1020" y="530" text-anchor="middle" class="subtitle">Add-On Products</text>
  <text x="920" y="560" text-anchor="start">• Motor Insurance</text>
  <text x="920" y="585" text-anchor="start">• LeaseGuard (redundancy)</text>
  <text x="920" y="610" text-anchor="start">• Minor Damage Repair</text>
  <text x="920" y="635" text-anchor="start">• Carbon Offset</text>
  <text x="920" y="660" text-anchor="start">• Roadside Assistance</text>
  <text x="920" y="685" text-anchor="start">• Exterior/Interior Protection</text>
  <text x="920" y="710" text-anchor="start">• Window Tint</text>
  <text x="920" y="735" text-anchor="start">• Dash Cam</text>
  <text x="920" y="760" text-anchor="start">• EV Charging Cable</text>
  <text x="920" y="785" text-anchor="start">• Driver Safety Kit</text>
  
  <!-- Daily Structure Box -->
  <rect x="900" y="880" width="240" height="360" rx="10" ry="10" class="label-box" />
  <text x="1020" y="910" text-anchor="middle" class="subtitle">Daily Structure</text>
  <text x="920" y="940" text-anchor="start" font-weight="bold">8am-9am:</text>
  <text x="930" y="960" text-anchor="start">Clear inbox</text>
  
  <text x="920" y="990" text-anchor="start" font-weight="bold">9am-11am:</text>
  <text x="930" y="1010" text-anchor="start">• Call new enquiries</text>
  <text x="930" y="1030" text-anchor="start">• Follow up pipeline</text>
  <text x="930" y="1050" text-anchor="start">• Ask for commitment</text>
  
  <text x="920" y="1080" text-anchor="start" font-weight="bold">11am-3pm:</text>
  <text x="930" y="1100" text-anchor="start">• Process customer requests</text>
  <text x="930" y="1120" text-anchor="start">• Process finance apps</text>
  <text x="930" y="1140" text-anchor="start">• Complete admin tasks</text>
  
  <text x="920" y="1170" text-anchor="start" font-weight="bold">3pm-4pm:</text>
  <text x="930" y="1190" text-anchor="start">• Call new enquiries</text>
  <text x="930" y="1210" text-anchor="start">• Follow up morning quotes</text>
  
  <text x="920" y="1240" text-anchor="start" font-weight="bold">4pm-5pm:</text>
  <text x="930" y="1260" text-anchor="start">• Complete final emails/tasks</text>

  <!-- Key Document Types Legend -->
  <rect x="900" y="1300" width="240" height="220" rx="10" ry="10" class="document-box" />
  <text x="1020" y="1330" text-anchor="middle" class="subtitle">Key Documents</text>
  <text x="920" y="1360" text-anchor="start">• Finance Application</text>
  <text x="920" y="1385" text-anchor="start">• Novation Agreement</text>
  <text x="920" y="1410" text-anchor="start">• Privacy Consent Form</text>
  <text x="920" y="1435" text-anchor="start">• Direct Debit Request</text>
  <text x="920" y="1460" text-anchor="start">• Certified ID (if required)</text>
  <text x="920" y="1485" text-anchor="start">• Tax Invoice/Statement by</text>
  <text x="930" y="1505" text-anchor="start">Supplier (non-dealer)</text>
</svg>

docs.filename: Simplified Novated Lease Sales Process Flowchart.svg
docs.content:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 1200 1800">
  <!-- Simplified Styles with Maximum Readability -->
  <style>
    .process-box { fill: #E3F2FD; stroke: #1976D2; stroke-width: 3; }
    .decision-box { fill: #FFF8E1; stroke: #FFA000; stroke-width: 3; }
    .document-box { fill: #E8F5E9; stroke: #388E3C; stroke-width: 3; }
    .start-end-box { fill: #FFEBEE; stroke: #D32F2F; stroke-width: 3; }
    .arrow { stroke: #37474F; stroke-width: 2.5; fill: none; marker-end: url(#arrowhead); }
    .phase-label { fill: #263238; font-size: 24px; font-weight: bold; }
    .highlight-box { fill: #FFF8E1; stroke: #FFA000; stroke-width: 3; stroke-dasharray: 5,3; }
    .critical-step { stroke: #D32F2F; stroke-width: 4; }
    text { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; fill: #263238; }
    .title { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 40px; font-weight: bold; fill: #263238; }
    .subtitle { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 22px; font-weight: bold; fill: #263238; }
    .note { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; fill: #546E7A; }
    .box-title { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: bold; fill: #263238; }
    .side-panel { fill: #ECEFF1; stroke: #90A4AE; stroke-width: 2; }
  </style>
  
  <!-- Arrow Marker -->
  <defs>
    <marker id="arrowhead" markerWidth="12" markerHeight="8" refX="10" refY="4" orient="auto">
      <polygon points="0 0, 12 4, 0 8" fill="#37474F" />
    </marker>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="1200" height="1800" fill="#FAFAFA" />
  
  <!-- Title Section -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="1200" height="100" fill="#E3F2FD" />
  <text x="600" y="65" text-anchor="middle" class="title">Novated Lease Sales Process</text>
  
  <!-- === MAIN PROCESS FLOW (LEFT SIDE) === -->
  
  <!-- Phase 1: Initial Contact -->
  <rect x="50" y="140" width="700" height="50" fill="#ECEFF1" rx="5" ry="5" />
  <text x="400" y="175" text-anchor="middle" class="phase-label">PHASE 1: INITIAL CONTACT</text>
  
  <!-- Start -->
  <rect x="250" y="220" width="200" height="80" rx="10" ry="10" class="start-end-box" />
  <text x="350" y="265" text-anchor="middle" class="box-title">Initial Customer Contact</text>
  <text x="350" y="290" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(Email, Phone, Web Inquiry)</text>
  
  <path d="M350 300 L350 350" class="arrow" />
  
  <!-- Decision -->
  <rect x="200" y="350" width="300" height="80" rx="40" ry="40" class="decision-box" />
  <text x="350" y="395" text-anchor="middle" class="box-title">First-Time Customer?</text>
  
  <!-- No Path -->
  <path d="M500 390 L550 390 L550 490 L500 490" class="arrow" />
  <text x="520" y="380" text-anchor="middle" class="note">No</text>
  
  <!-- Yes Path -->
  <path d="M350 430 L350 480" class="arrow" />
  <text x="335" y="460" text-anchor="middle" class="note">Yes</text>
  
  <!-- Explain Novated -->
  <rect x="200" y="480" width="300" height="80" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="350" y="525" text-anchor="middle" class="box-title">Explain Novated Leasing</text>
  <text x="350" y="550" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(Use Initial Consult Call Script)</text>
  
  <path d="M350 560 L350 610" class="arrow" />
  
  <!-- Phase 2: Quoting Process -->
  <rect x="50" y="610" width="700" height="50" fill="#ECEFF1" rx="5" ry="5" />
  <text x="400" y="645" text-anchor="middle" class="phase-label">PHASE 2: QUOTING PROCESS</text>
  
  <!-- Gather Info -->
  <rect x="200" y="690" width="300" height="80" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="350" y="735" text-anchor="middle" class="box-title">Gather Customer Information</text>
  <text x="350" y="760" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(Vehicle, Salary, Kilometers)</text>
  
  <path d="M350 770 L350 820" class="arrow" />
  
  <!-- Create Quote -->
  <rect x="200" y="820" width="300" height="80" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="350" y="865" text-anchor="middle" class="box-title">Generate Quote in Miles</text>
  <text x="350" y="890" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(See Miles Quoting Guide)</text>
  
  <path d="M350 900 L350 950" class="arrow" />
  
  <!-- Send Quote -->
  <rect x="200" y="950" width="300" height="80" rx="10" ry="10" class="document-box" />
  <text x="350" y="995" text-anchor="middle" class="box-title">Send Quote to Customer</text>
  <text x="350" y="1020" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(Explain Tax Benefits)</text>
  
  <path d="M350 1030 L350 1080" class="arrow" />
  
  <!-- Customer Proceeds? -->
  <rect x="200" y="1080" width="300" height="80" rx="40" ry="40" class="decision-box" />
  <text x="350" y="1125" text-anchor="middle" class="box-title">Customer Proceeds?</text>
  
  <!-- No Path -->
  <path d="M500 1120 L575 1120 L575 1020 L500 1020" class="arrow" />
  <text x="525" y="1110" text-anchor="middle" class="note">No - Schedule Follow-up (7-10 days)</text>
  
  <!-- Yes Path -->
  <path d="M350 1160 L350 1210" class="arrow" />
  <text x="335" y="1190" text-anchor="middle" class="note">Yes</text>
  
  <!-- Phase 3: Application Process -->
  <rect x="50" y="1210" width="700" height="50" fill="#ECEFF1" rx="5" ry="5" />
  <text x="400" y="1245" text-anchor="middle" class="phase-label">PHASE 3: APPLICATION PROCESS</text>
  
  <!-- Finance Application -->
  <rect x="200" y="1290" width="300" height="80" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box critical-step" />
  <text x="350" y="1335" text-anchor="middle" class="box-title">Process Finance Application</text>
  <text x="350" y="1360" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(Online/Manual + Trade-in if Applicable)</text>
  
  <path d="M350 1370 L350 1420" class="arrow" />
  
  <!-- Finance Assessment -->
  <rect x="200" y="1420" width="300" height="80" rx="10" ry="10" class="process-box" />
  <text x="350" y="1465" text-anchor="middle" class="box-title">Finance Pre-Assessment</text>
  <text x="350" y="1490" text-anchor="middle" class="note">(CBA/Autonomy)</text>
  
  <path d="M350 1500 L350 1550" class="arrow" />
  
  <!-- Approval Status -->
  <rect x="200" y="1550" width="300" height="80" rx="40" ry="40" class="decision-box" />
  <text x="350" y="1595" text-anchor="middle" class="box-title">Approval Status?</text>
  
  <!-- Declined Path -->
  <path d="M500 1590 L575 1590 L575 1335 L500 1335" class="arrow" />
  <text x="535" y="1580" text-anchor="middle" class="note">Declined</text>
  <text x="535" y="1455" text-anchor="middle" class="note">Review Alternatives</text>
  
  <!-- Conditional Path -->
  <path d="M200 1590 L125 1590 L125 1670 L200 1670" class="arrow" />
  <text x="160" y="1580" text-anchor="middle" class="note">Conditional</text>
  <text x="150" y="1640" text-anchor="middle" class="note">Meet Conditions</text>
  
  <!-- Approved Path -->
  <path d="M350 1630 L350 1680" class="arrow" />
  <text x="335" y="1660" text-anchor="middle" class="note">Approved</text>
  
  <!-- Simplified Next Steps Section -->
  <rect x="50" y="1680" width="700" height="70" fill="#FFEBEE" rx="5" ry="5" />
  <text x="400" y="1725" text-anchor="middle" class="subtitle">Next Steps After Approval:</text>
  
  <text x="100" y="1765" text-anchor="start" class="box-title">1. Vehicle Procurement</text>
  <text x="100" y="1785" text-anchor="start" class="note">• Dealer Purchase OR Non-Dealer (Private/Company/Leaseback)</text>
  
  <text x="450" y="1765" text-anchor="start" class="box-title">2. Documentation & Settlement</text>
  <text x="450" y="1785" text-anchor="start" class="note">• Generate & execute finance documents, submit for funding</text>
  
  <!-- PHEV Special Process -->
  <rect x="100" y="1805" width="600" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" class="highlight-box" />
  <text x="400" y="1845" text-anchor="middle" class="box-title">CRITICAL: PHEV Delivery by March 31, 2025 for FBT Exemption</text>
  
  <!-- === SIDE PANEL (RIGHT SIDE) === -->
  
  <!-- Side Panel Background -->
  <rect x="800" y="140" width="350" height="1660" class="side-panel" />
  <text x="975" y="180" text-anchor="middle" class="subtitle">QUICK REFERENCE GUIDE</text>
  
  <!-- KPIs Section -->
  <rect x="825" y="200" width="300" height="220" fill="#E3F2FD" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="#1976D2" stroke-width="2" />
  <text x="975" y="230" text-anchor="middle" class="box-title">SALES TARGETS</text>
  <text x="840" y="265" text-anchor="start">• Motor Insurance (75%)</text>
  <text x="840" y="295" text-anchor="start">• LeaseGuard (50%)</text>
  <text x="840" y="325" text-anchor="start">• Minor Damage Repair (70%)</text>
  <text x="840" y="355" text-anchor="start">• Carbon Offset (60%)</text>
  <text x="840" y="385" text-anchor="start">• Roadside Assistance (55%)</text>
  
  <!-- Add-On Products -->
  <rect x="825" y="440" width="300" height="320" fill="#E8F5E9" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="#388E3C" stroke-width="2" />
  <text x="975" y="470" text-anchor="middle" class="box-title">ADD-ON PRODUCTS</text>
  <text x="840" y="505" text-anchor="start">• Motor Insurance</text>
  <text x="840" y="535" text-anchor="start">• LeaseGuard (redundancy)</text>
  <text x="840" y="565" text-anchor="start">• Minor Damage Repair</text>
  <text x="840" y="595" text-anchor="start">• Carbon Offset</text>
  <text x="840" y="625" text-anchor="start">• Roadside Assistance</text>
  <text x="840" y="655" text-anchor="start">• Exterior/Interior Protection</text>
  <text x="840" y="685" text-anchor="start">• Window Tint</text>
  <text x="840" y="715" text-anchor="start">• Dash Cam</text>
  <text x="840" y="745" text-anchor="start">• EV Charging Cable</text>
  
  <!-- Daily Structure -->
  <rect x="825" y="780" width="300" height="350" fill="#ECEFF1" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="#90A4AE" stroke-width="2" />
  <text x="975" y="810" text-anchor="middle" class="box-title">DAILY STRUCTURE</text>
  
  <text x="840" y="845" text-anchor="start" font-weight="bold">8am-9am:</text>
  <text x="850" y="875" text-anchor="start">• Clear inbox</text>
  
  <text x="840" y="910" text-anchor="start" font-weight="bold">9am-11am:</text>
  <text x="850" y="940" text-anchor="start">• Call new enquiries</text>
  <text x="850" y="970" text-anchor="start">• Follow up pipeline</text>
  <text x="850" y="1000" text-anchor="start">• Ask for commitment</text>
  
  <text x="840" y="1035" text-anchor="start" font-weight="bold">11am-3pm:</text>
  <text x="850" y="1065" text-anchor="start">• Process customer requests</text>
  <text x="850" y="1095" text-anchor="start">• Process finance apps</text>
  
  <text x="840" y="1130" text-anchor="start" font-weight="bold">3pm-5pm:</text>
  <text x="850" y="1160" text-anchor="start">• Follow up morning quotes</text>
  <text x="850" y="1190" text-anchor="start">• Complete final tasks</text>

  <!-- Key Documents -->
  <rect x="825" y="1150" width="300" height="270" fill="#E8F5E9" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="#388E3C" stroke-width="2" />
  <text x="975" y="1180" text-anchor="middle" class="box-title">KEY DOCUMENTS</text>
  <text x="840" y="1215" text-anchor="start">• Finance Application</text>
  <text x="840" y="1245" text-anchor="start">• Novation Agreement</text>
